works.description:
I am the owner of the WOW Content Club and several other private label content sites. I happened to Google 'WOW Content Club' the other day, just to see what was listed there and was shocked to discover that the 6th listing on the page, below my listings, was the following:

WizGizmo - Wow Content Club Downloads!
http://www.blackhatteam.com/f51/wizgizmo-wow-content-club-downloads-11018.html
WOW CONTENT CLUB DOWNLOADS NOTE: When you get to a page, before you leave, be sure to scroll down to the bottom to see if there is a link to more ...

Apparently, this is some type of black hat forum that delights in providing its members with pilfered content. I sent them an email requesting that they remove the links to my products from their site, but they have not responded. So I am bringing this to your attention.

It is bad enough that they are stealing all my hard work and reputation. Worse that they are getting a high listing in your search engine for doing so. Please help.
